seo-reports-subtitle: Analyse crawl, index, keyword, and backlink performance for every managed site.
seo-reports-overview-desc: High-level health signals aggregated across all sites.
seo-reports-overview-empty: No SEO data is available yet. Connect analytics feeds to populate this dashboard.
seo-reports-index-trend-desc: Daily index counts split by PC and mobile.
seo-reports-crawler-desc: Search engine crawl hits over time.
seo-reports-crawler-empty: No crawler logs recorded for this period.
seo-reports-sitemap-desc: Submission status, index rates, and link hygiene per sitemap.
seo-reports-backlinks-desc: Backlink acquisition trends and recent changes.
seo-reports-anchors-desc: Most common anchor texts across backlinks.
seo-reports-content-desc: TDK completeness, body quality, and internal linking scores.
seo-reports-alerts-desc: Priority actions detected in this snapshot.
seo-reports-alerts-empty: Everything looks healthy. No SEO alerts triggered.
seo-reports-alert-health-low-desc: Resolve crawl errors, coverage gaps, and ranking drops as soon as possible.
seo-reports-alert-health-watch-desc: Investigate index coverage and ranking trends before they worsen.
seo-reports-alert-deadlinks-desc: %d URL(s) returned 404 or soft 404 responses. Replace or exclude them.
seo-reports-alert-backlinks-drop-desc: Backlink velocity is negative. Reach out to regain recent referring domains.
seo-reports-alert-tdk-desc: Review titles, descriptions, and headings to meet SEO guidelines.
seo-reports-card-health-hint: Aggregated SEO health index across all sites.
seo-reports-card-indexed-hint: Combined PC and mobile index coverage from connected search consoles.
seo-reports-card-keyword-hint: Net change across tracked keyword positions.
seo-reports-card-backlinks-hint: Net change in backlink counts summed across sites.
